entry.title: [CW] Question for you, TheMotte users that are part of the zoomer-millennial demograp
entry.content:
Question for you, TheMotte users that are part of the zoomer-millennial demographic;
Have you noticed that, in your middle-upper class bubble of fellow z-millennials, that a big chunk of people vote left only for lgbt rights?
I mean, anedoctically, a big percenteage of my acquiantances vote left only for that reason, also if they do not agree at all economically or politically with them (and are completely straight so they have no skin in the game)
Real quotes: "I think that their economic policy is stupid, but I vote them for DDL Zan (a failed law on discrimination in Italy)" " I hate them because they are not too left wing, but they support lgbt" " Meh, they looks the only one that protects gays"
It is also true in your experience? And if so, how is possible that this question has become so important for so many people that have no skin in the game?
